title: Chest Commands 插件问题
author: 夜猫H
txt_content:
这是配置信息  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&c指令菜单'
  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 6
  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: 'z'
  # auto-refresh - OPTIONAL
  # How frequently the menu will be refreshed, in seconds.
  # Useful if you have variables in items' descriptions.
  auto-refresh: 5
  # This command command will be execute when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  open-action: ''
  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only right-clicking with orange wool [35:1]
  open-with-item:
    id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
保存后，右键使用不了/z也同样使用不了，请问如何编辑。

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-482226-1-1.html这是插件地址

replies.author: asjwdwan521
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: rainsojey
replies.txt_content: 插件的格式有严格的缩进，不能错一个格式，不然就会不加载！

replies.author: 无为之才
replies.txt_content:
你在这一行，找到这个 open-action: ''
把后面单引号里面加一个空格试试，配置文件缩进没问题，只能看看是不是这个问题了
顺便说一句，这一行单引号里面写的东西是打开菜单后弹出来的话

比如 sound: note pling; tell: &e你打开了服务器主菜单. 

还有问题请回复，帮到你了给个最佳，谢谢。。。
